languages.text: "Оценка заслуженна. Система Тинаурус была великим //испытанием веры//проверкой предела прочности//актом разрушительного ксеноцида//".
"Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."
languages.original_text: "Оценка заслуженна. Система Тинаурус была великим //испытанием веры//проверкой предела прочности//актом разрушительного ксеноцида//".

traits.locale_text: "This evaluation is appropriate. The Tinaurus system was a great test of faith/assessment of the durability threshold/act of destructive xenocide."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

traits.locale_text: "This evaluation is appropriate. The Tinaurus system was a great test of faith/assessment of the durability threshold/act of destructive xenocide."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

traits.locale_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was a great test of faith/assessment of this unit's durability threshold/act of destructive xenocide."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

traits.locale_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was a great test of faith/assessment of this unit's durability threshold/act of destructive xenocide."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

traits.locale_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

traits.locale_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: 「適切な分析です。ティナウルス星系は//信仰心を大いに試す試練//本ユニットの耐久性のしきい値の評価//破壊的な異種族大虐殺行為//でありました」
languages.original_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."

traits.locale_text: 「適切な分析です。ティナウルス星系は//信仰心を大いに試す試練//本ユニットの耐久性のしきい値の評価//破壊的な異種族大虐殺行為//でありました」
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: “有效评估。提诺斯系统//是对信念的巨大考验//是对本单位耐久性阈值的评估//是一种毁灭性的灭绝行为//。”
languages.original_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."

traits.locale_text: “有效评估。提诺斯系统//是对信念的巨大考验//是对本单位耐久性阈值的评估//是一种毁灭性的灭绝行为//。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: «Apreciación válida. El sistema Tinaurus fue //una gran prueba de fe//una evaluación de durabilidad para esta unidad//un acto de xenocidio destructivo//».
languages.original_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."

traits.locale_text: «Apreciación válida. El sistema Tinaurus fue //una gran prueba de fe//una evaluación de durabilidad para esta unidad//un acto de xenocidio destructivo//».
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: « Jugement valide. L'exploration du système de Tinaurus fut //une grande épreuve de foi//une évaluation du seuil de durabilité de cette unité//un xénocide destructeur//. »
languages.original_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."

traits.locale_text: « Jugement valide. L'exploration du système de Tinaurus fut //une grande épreuve de foi//une évaluation du seuil de durabilité de cette unité//un xénocide destructeur//. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: "Korrekte Einschätzung. Das Tinaurus-System war //eine große Glaubensprüfung//ein Test, wie viel diese Einheit aushält//ein destruktiver Xenozid//."
languages.original_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."

traits.locale_text: "Korrekte Einschätzung. Das Tinaurus-System war //eine große Glaubensprüfung//ein Test, wie viel diese Einheit aushält//ein destruktiver Xenozid//."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: "Geçerli değerlendirme. Tinaurus Sistemi, //büyük bir inanç imtihanı//bu birimin dayanıklılık eşiğinin sınanması//yıkıcı bir zenokıyım örneği// olmuştur."
languages.original_text: "Valid assessment. The Tinaurus System was //a great test of faith//an assessment of this unit's durability threshold//an act of destructive xenocide//."

traits.locale_text: "Geçerli değerlendirme. Tinaurus Sistemi, //başarılı bir inanç testiydi//bu birimin dayanıklılık eşiğinin bir değerlendirmesiydi//yıkıcı bir zenokıyım örneğiydi//."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest
